channel.title: Hosting
channel.description:
Well, I cant host my server but I Port forwarded: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/4103/portforwardmt2.png[/img][/URL]
and my no-ip is running: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/2548/noipvt1.png[/img][/URL]
and my firewall also allows port 43594.. And I've got my server running to but others still can't join. what do i need to do?

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

eviltwin1:

hmm idk then the only thing i can think of is that ur no-ip isnt up but it was…try having the window physiaclly in front of u cuz sometimes when its not running like in that little bar down by were it says the time then my server wont run…other than that srry im puzzled on that one

hmm no that also doesnt work. ty for ur help anyways

Read full topic
